page.title: 07HEATON PARK - RECREATION
page.content:
{Sports Facilities}- 6 Tennis courts- 2 Crown bowling greens- 1 Flat bowling green- 1 Golf course- 1 Pitch and Putt course- 1 Putting green- Playing Fields
{The Golf course}was made between 1915 and 1920.The putting greens were built with a labour force of unemployed men in the 1920-30 period of depression. The Pitch and Putt course was built in 1950.
{Heaton Farm}has farming equipment and lots of animals.There is a pets corner next to it.In the farm there is a hatchery where you can see chicks at different ages.
